Player History
Earned first career win on 5/29/2001...
Injured on 6/12/2002 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Texas to Houston on 5/16/2005 (Going to HOU: 1B J. Morneau, P M. Suazo. Going to TEX: P B. Hendren, 2B R. Cano)...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/8/2005, off Ryan Vogelsong (ATL)...
Released by Houston on 11/1/2007...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 3/1/2008 to a 5-year deal worth $8,550,000 per year...
Traded from Boston to New York (A) on 7/31/2008 (Going to BOS: P T. Van Poppel. Going to NYY: P M. Suazo, LF A. Presley, P B. Badenhop, LF S. Smith)...
Traded from New York (A) to Baltimore on 2/25/2010 (Going to NYY: C J. Castro, 3B T. Frazier. Going to BAL: P M. Suazo)...
Injured on 5/8/2010 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/2012, winning 2 games with a 1.15 ERA...
Injured on 9/4/2014 with a Tender Elbow, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/28/2015 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Seattle in 2018...
Injured on 5/23/2018 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/19/2018 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Bryan Bullington (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2019, off Jake Peavy (ARI)...
